t: Amazon hiring thousands of workers across Southern California
s: February 12, 2025 - Amazon is looking to hire thousands of new workers across Southern California. The massive e-commerce company is hiring more than 2,000 full-time and part-time workers in the Inland Empire area. The company opened two inbound cross-dock facilities in Fontana and Jurupa Valley.
